description: Production ChromaDB configuration using client-server mode with ChromaDB container

_comments.client_server_mode: Uses external ChromaDB server - better performance, data persistence
_comments.embedded_mode: Uses local file-based storage - simpler setup, no external dependencies
_comments._chroma_db_path: Only used in embedded mode - commented out for client_server mode
_comments.chroma_server_host: Uses 'chromadb' container name when running in mcp-network
